ref: 1207 *āpārayati ʻ fills ʼ. [Cf. pārayati ʻ fills ʼ Dhātup., āˊpūrayati ŚBr., āˊpr̥ṇāti ʻ satisfies ʼ RV.: &rcirclemacr With anal. -- pp -- : K. āparun ʻ to feed another with one's own hand as a sign of hospitality, put food in an infant's or invalid's mouth ʼ, caus. āparāwun ʻ to feed another person ʼ.
